item.title: 显示HN：Markdown-UI，llms的交互式UI
item.description:
Currently LLMs can only stream raw text and users can only respond in raw text.This open, MIT license standard allows LLMs to send simple, secure, JSON code blocks which get rendered into widgets.The widgets can emit events, which your application can capture and send back as text to the LLM.Currently I've coded a proof of concept using an extended marked.js parser and Svelte 5 renderer, but any解析器或渲染器（备注，反应等）可以支持此标准。请让我知道您的想法！
注释url： https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=44836295 点：1 ＃评论：0
